question:
Marcy bought one pair of jeans at 70% off and one blouse at 40% off. If she paid $12 more for the blouse than for the jeans, and she spent a total of $84, what was the original price of the jeans?
(A) 76
(B) 96
(C) 100
(D) 120
(E) 124
